name: General check-up
description: A routine medical examination to assess a person's overall health status, including vital signs, physical examination, and laboratory tests.

name: X-ray
description: A diagnostic test that uses electromagnetic radiation to produce images of bones and internal organs.

name: Blood test
description: A laboratory test that measures various substances in the blood, such as glucose, cholesterol, and electrolytes.

name: ECG (electrocardiogram)
description: A diagnostic test that records the electrical activity of the heart.

name: Vaccination
description: A preventive measure that helps to protect against various infectious diseases, such as flu, pneumonia, and tetanus.

name: MRI (magnetic resonance imaging)
description: A diagnostic test that uses a magnetic field and radio waves to produce detailed images of the body's internal structures.

name: CT scan (computed tomography)
description: A diagnostic test that uses X-rays and computer technology to produce detailed images of the body's internal structures.

name: Ultrasound
description: A diagnostic test that uses high-frequency sound waves to produce images of the body's internal structures.

name: Physical therapy session
description: A rehabilitation program that helps to improve mobility, function, and quality of life through exercise and other techniques.

name: Occupational therapy session
description: A rehabilitation program that helps to improve a person's ability to perform daily living and work-related tasks.

name: Initial psychiatric evaluation
description: A comprehensive assessment of a patient's mental health status, including a review of their symptoms, medical history, and current medications.

name: Skin biopsy
description: A procedure that involves removing a small piece of skin for examination under a microscope to diagnose skin conditions.

name: Knee arthroscopy
description: A minimally invasive surgical procedure that uses a small camera to diagnose and treat problems in the knee joint.

name: Echocardiogram
description: A diagnostic test that uses sound waves to produce images of the heart and its blood vessels.

name: Colonoscopy
description: A diagnostic test that examines the inside of the colon and rectum to detect abnormalities and screen for colon cancer.

name: Cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT)
description: A form of therapy that helps patients identify and change negative thought patterns and behaviors that contribute to mental health problems.

name: Allergy testing
description: A series of tests that identify specific allergens that trigger allergic reactions, such as food, pollen, or pet dander.
